bidan

gi aseTad aris

isa, roca

 nivTis

disieria.

sindisierebis

s SemZeni

samoqalaqo saproceso kodeqsis 407-e muxlis mixedviT, s


aapelacio sasamarTlos 


mier damtkicebulad cnobili faqtobrivi garemoebebi sava


ldebuloa sakasacio 


sasamarTlosaTvis, Tu wamoyenebuli ar aris dasaSvebi da d


asabuTebuli pretenzia 


(Sedaveba). dasaSvebi da dasabuTebuli pretenzia warmoad


gens mxaris miTiTebas 


procesualur-samarTlebriv darRvevebze, romlebmac faqtobrivi 


garemoebebis arasworad 


dadgena ganapirobes. kasators amgvari pretenzia ar warmoud


genia, Sesabamisad, 


zemoaRniSnuli faqtobrivi garemoebebi savaldebuloa saka


sacio palatisaTvis. 


gansaxilvel SemTxvevaSi Segebebuli sarCelis avtori ip


oTekis xelSekurlebis 


baTilad cnobas ori samarTlebrivi safuZvliT iTxovda: ro


gorc motyuebiT dadebuli 


garigebis da rogorc garigebis, romelic kanonis savaldebul


o moTxovnaTa darRveviT 


gaformda. mxaris miTiTebiT,  man ar icoda qarTuli ena, gari


gebis dadebas ar eswreboda 


Tarjimani, xelSekrulebis teqsti misTvis aravis uTargmnia


, amasTan egona, rom xels 


rogorc mowme ise awerda. 


samoqalaqo kodeqsis 59-e muxlis Tanaxmad, baTilia ka


noniT an xelSekrulebiT 


gaTvaliswinebuli aucilebeli formis dacviT dadebuli ga


rigeba, aseve nebarTvis gareSe 


dadebuli garigeba, Tu am garigebisaTvis saWiroa nebarTva


. 


`sanotaro moqmedebaTa Sesrulebis wesis Sesaxeb~ instruq


ciis 24-e muxlis 


pirveli punqtis Tanaxmad, sanotaro aqti (sajaro aqti) u


nda Sedges saxelmwifo enaze. 


amasTanave, sanotaro moqmedebis monawilis (monawileebis


) mier saxelmwifo enis an misi 


damwerlobis arcodnisas, notariusi sanotaro moqmedebas asru


lebs Tarjimnis 


monawileobiT. aseT SemTxvevaSi savaldebuloa sanotaro 


aqti Sedges klientisaTvis 


gasageb enazec. Tarjimnis monacemebi Seitaneba sanota


ro moqmedebaTa registraciis 


reestrSi da sanotaro aqtSi. Tu notariusma icis Sesabami


si ena, dokuments Targmnis 


TviTon da amis Sesaxeb miuTiTebs aqtSi, Tuki amis win


aaRmdegi ar aris sanotaro 


moqmedebis monawile.  


sakasacio palata iziarebs saapelacio sasamarTlos pozi


cias, rom Tu n. b-Zem 


sanotaro moqmedebis Sesrulebis ena ar icoda, mas aRniSn


ulis Taobaze unda ganecxadebina 


garigebis dadebis momentSi, rac ar  gaukeTebia. 


sakasacio palata ver gaiziarebs kasatoris mtkicebas, rom


 saapelacio sasamarTlom 


n. b-Zis mier qarTuli enis codnis faqti mtkicebulebaTa


 gamokvlevis gareSe daadgina. 


rogorc gasaCivrebuli gadawyvetilebidan irkveva, saapelac


io sasamarTlom gamoikvlia 


yvela mtkicebuleba, magram miiCnia, rom mowmeTa Cvenebeb


i gaziarebuli ver iqneboda. 


samoqalaqo saproceso kodeqsis 105-e muxlis me-2 nawili


s mixedviT sasamarTlo 


afasebs mtkicebulebebs Tavisi Sinagani rwmeniT, romelic


 unda emyarebodes sasamarTlo 


sxdomaze maTs yovelmxriv, srul da obieqtur ganxilvas, ris


 Sedegadac mas gamoaqvs 


324


daskvna saqmisaTvis mniSvnelobis mqone garemoebebis 


arsebobis an ararsebobis Sesaxeb. 


aRniSnuli normiT damkvidrebuli mtkicebulebaTa Tavisufa


li Sefasebis principidan 


gamomdinare, sasamarTlo, mtkicebulebebis gamokvlevisa S


emdeg, Tavad wyvets romeli 


maTgani unda miiCnios sarwmunod da gaiziaros.    


rac Seexeba Segebebuli sarCelis avtoris mier miTiTebul 


garigebis baTilobis 


meore samarTlebriv safuZvels (motyuebiT dadebuli garige


ba) sakasacio palata aseve 


iziarebs saapelacio sasamarTlos mtkicebas, rom mxaris m


ier miTiTebuli garemoebebi 


motyuebad ver CaiTvleboda. n. b-Ze miuTiTebda, rom ar ico


da, ra xelSekurlebaze awerda 


xels, aRniSnuli ki motyuebad ver CaiTvleba, radganac dok


umentis xelmowera adasturebs 


misi Sinaarsis codnas. 


samoqalaqo saproceso kodeqsis 102-e muxlis pirveli nawi


lis mixedviT, 


TiToeulma mxarem unda daamtkicos garemoebani, romlebzed


ac igi amyarebs Tavis 


moTxovnebsa da Sesagebels. gansaxilvel SemTxvevaSi, n


. b-Zes i. f-avas mxridan motyuebis 


faqtis damadasturebeli sakmarisi mtkicebulebebi sasam


arTlosaTvis ar warudgenia.     


rac Seexeba saapelacio sasamarTlos miTiTebas, rom n. b-Z


em ipoTekis xelSekruleba 


sacilod 1-wliani vadis gasvlis Semdeg gaxada, aRniSnul


Tan dakavSirebiT sakasacio 


palata ganmartavs Semdegs: samoqalaqo kodeqsis 84-e


 muxli adgens specialur sasarCelo 


xandazmulobis vadas motyuebiT dadebuli garigebebisaT


vis, romelic erT wels Seadgens. 


xandazmuloba aris darRveuli uflebis iZulebiT dacvis va


da, amasTan, xandazmulobis 


vadis gasvla ki ar aqarwylebs moTxovnas, aramed mas moTx


ovnas ganuxorcieleblad aqcevs. 


swored am garemoebis gaTvaliswinebiT, sasamarTlos xandazm


ulobis sakitxis gamokveleva 


SeuZlia mxolod im SemTxvevaSi, Tu mas sadavod mxare x


dis. garda amisa, sasarCelo 


xandazmulobis Sedegi procesualuri xasiaTis ufroa, vidre 


materialuri, radgan 


xandazmuloba aris sarCelisagan Tavis dacvis erT-erTi fo


rma da TavisTavad moTxovnis 


gaqarwylebas ar iwvevs. sasarCelo xandazmulobis Sesaxeb k


anonmdebloba adgens 


saSualebas da ara uflebas, amasTan xandazmulobas ar aq


vs efeqti, mxaris miTiTebis 


gareSe. swored aRniSnulidan gamomdinare, xandazmuloba gani


xileba, rogorc saqmis 


fqtobrivi garemoeba. mxare ki, saproceso kanonmdeblobiT S


ezRudulia miuTiTos axali 


faqtebisa da mtkicebulebebis Sesaxeb zemdgom instan


ciebSi, amdenad miCneulia, rom 


xandazmulobis sakiTxis dayeneba SesaZlebelia mxolod


 pirveli instanciis sasamarTloSi. 


moTxovnis xandazmulobis Sesaxeb miTiTeba pirvelad sa


apelacio an sakasacio instanciaSi 


iseve dauSvebelia, rogorc axal faqtebsa da garemoebebz


e miTiTeba. 


gansaxilvel SemTxvevaSi n. b-Zis moTxovnis xandazmul


obis sakiTxi ss `... bankis~ 


warmomadgenelma d. k-Zem saapelacio sasamarTlos sxdoma


ze gakeTebuli axsna-ganmartebisas 


daayena. pirveli instanciis sasamarTloSi wardgenil Sesa


gebelSi igi am garemoebaze ar 


uTiTebda, rac Seexeba sasamarTlos mTavar sxdomas, gaugeb


aria, hqonda Tu ara mas amgvari 


pozicia, radganac baTumis saqalaqo sasamarTlos 2009 wlis


 17 noembris sxdomis oqmi, 


mosarCelis axsna-ganmartebas faqtiurad ar asaxavs.  


am garemoebis gaTvaliswinebiT, saapelacio sasamarTlo ar 


iyo uflebamosili n. b-


Zis sasarCelo moTxovnis xandazmulobaze emsjela, magra


m aqve gasaTvaliswinebelia is 


garemoebac, rom miuxedavad imisa, caiTvelobda Tu ara Seg


ebebuli sarCeli xandazmulad, 


misi dakmayofilebis samarTlebrivi safuZveli mainc ar a


rsebobda, Sesabamisad, 


zemoaRniSnul darRvevas saqmis ganxilvis Sedegze gavlen


a ar mouxdenia.   


samoqalaqo saproceso kodeqsis 410-e muxlis `a~ da `Gg


~ qvepunqtebis mixedviT,

vars, Tu kanonis miTitebul 


darRvevas ar aqvs adgili an saapelacio sasamarTlos gada


wyvetileba arsebitad sworia, 


miuxedavad imisa, rom gadawyvetilebis samotivacio nawil


i ar Seicavs Sesabamis 


dasabuTebas.

sakasacio palata gaecno saqmis masalebs da Tvlis, rom k. a-Zis 


Suamdgomloba unda dakmayofildes Semdeg garemoebaTa gamo:  


dadgenilia, rom germaniis federaciuli respublikis vetcleris 


pirveli instanciis sasamarTlos 2010 wlis 25 Tebervlis 


gadawyvetilebiT gauqmda qorwineba k. a-Zesa da a. k-ems Soris,

wlis 25 Tebervals. 


`saerTaSoriso kerZo  samarTlis Sesaxeb~ saqarTvelos kanonis 


68-e muxlis me-5 nawilis Tanaxmad, ucxo qveynis sasamarTlos 


gadawyvetilebis cnobis sakiTxs ixilavs saqarTvelos uzenaesi 


sasamarTlo. amave muxlis pirveli nawilis Sesabamisad, 


saqarTvelo cnobs ucxo qveynis kanonier ZalaSi Sesul 


sasamarTlo gadawyvetilebebs garda im SemTxvevebisa, romlebic 


gaTvaliswinebulia me-2, me-3 da me-4 nawilebiT. sakasacio 


sasamarTlos miaCnia, rom mocemul SemTxvevaSi zemoxsenebul 


normaSi miTiTebuli damabrkolebeli garemoebebi ar arsebobs. 


amdenad, germaniis vetcleris pirveli instanciis sasamarTlos 


2010 wlis 25 Tebervlis gadawyvetileba saqarTvelos uzenaesi 


sasamarTlos samoqalaqo saqmeTa palatis mier unda iqnas 


cnobili da mieqces aRsasruleblad saqarTvelos teritoriaze.
